title: DTL to UNIX Time Converter
name: LGF_DTLToUnixTime
description: This function converts the date and time of data type DTL to the UNIX time of data type DInt. The timestamp is calculated in UTC.

input.name: timeDTL
input.description: Date and time as DTL to convert to UNIX time

output.name: error
output.description: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: status
output.description: Status of the FB, Error identification
